Uses of Class
net.sf.javaml.filter.AbstractFilter

Packages that use AbstractFilter
net.sf.javaml.filter Provides filters for instances and data sets. 
net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize Provides filters that can discretize continuous values 
net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue Contains filters that can be used to replace missing values with more sensible information. 
net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize Provides filters to normalize values. 
 

Uses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter
 

Subclasses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter
 class ClassReplaceFilter
          Replaces a certain class value with another one.
 class RemoveAttributes
           
 class RetainAttributes
          Filter to retain a set of wanted attributes and remove all others
 class UnsetClassFilter
          Filter to remove class information from a data set or instance.
 

Uses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize
 

Subclasses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize
 class EqualWidthBinning
          A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into nominal attributes.
 

Uses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue
 

Subclasses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue
 class ReplaceWithValue
          Replaces all missing values with a fixed value.
 

Uses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize
 

Subclasses of AbstractFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize
 class InstanceNormalizeMidrange
          This filter will normalize all the attributes in an instance to a certain interval determined by a mid-range and a range.
 class NormalizeMean
          This filter will normalize the data set with mean 0 and standard deviation 1 The normalization will be done on the attributes, so each attribute will have mean 0 and std 1.
 class NormalizeMeanIQR135
          This filter will normalize the data set with mean 0 and standard deviation 1 The normalization will be done on the attributes, so each attribute will have mean 0 and std 1.
 class NormalizeMidrange
          This filter will normalize the data set with a certain mid-range and a certain range for each attribute.
